title: pbe signup error:500
body: PBE signup error，check the status of the page can not be normal access, how is this going on?

replies.body: This is an issue we're currently investigating and gathering more information on.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look, and bring along any additional information and screenshots.  We'll take a look!

I hope it gets fixed soon!

Good luck RITO!

We believe!
i found that when i turn my VPN off it starts to work again, hope that helps {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Every time I open this page is like this, not check my application information, can be repaired as soon as possible?{{summoner:6}}
